Text: man i forgot how slow these new 720p torrents are on piratebay. ive been using torrentday last few months for my major downloads and this wasnt on Tday when it was upped on here. so 19 hrs of downloading later (on 20mb cable internet) im 60.1% done with an average of 64.1kbps. PATHETIC. everybody that uses tpb should try a private site for a while and try and get it into your thick skulls the notion of SHARING. on torrentday this would download in 1 hour @1.5-2MBps because you connect to prob 80,90% of seeds. this torrent im connected to 9 from 578 as i type.....SUCH SELFISHNESS

Torrent day not so good for hd content(rar files, almost 99%are scene releases-no wiki,chd esir there)...but a private tracker can't be compared to a public one in terms of speed of course.
But many don't know to tweak their torrent client to increase the max nr of connected peers ,and max nr of slots settings which will help dl faster.

yeh, maybe your points might be true autobotHD, but there is nothing as frustrating as waiting for a movie and then it appears but you have to wait 1,2, sometimes even 3 days!!! salt is a perfect example, i dont do less than 720p blurays (pc plugged into large lcd), so the r5 been around for aaaaages and FINALLY the BR rip comes.....drip drip drip. EXCRUTIATING! rars maybe a pain, but theres nothing like finding a new upload that you really want and you KNOW its gonna fly down
